#013: Using Web Sockets with Django

  • Proposal Details
  • Reviews 2
  • Speaker Feedback 0
Audience Level
 
Category
tutorial 
Description
The aim of the tutorial is to bring about the awareness and consciousness of what web socket is and how to leverage its use in a Python/Django project. 
Abstract
  1. Brief introduction of what the WebSocket protocol is and give the audience a final look of what they are about to learn.
  2. A link to the source code on GitHub will be given.
  3. A well-described snippet showing how the final product was reached will be presented in sequence.
 
Notes

Python Django developer with 2 years + experience

 
Documents
No supporting documents attached to this proposal.

The proposal author was generous to inform about what will pass an introduction to websockets in Django. I'm not impressed however that this leaves out specific details about what the attendees will benefit from attending the tutorial.
